short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Press control and hover over a page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hover over a page to open a small preview of it that you can interact with!

- Simply move your mouse away from the link to get rid of this window
- Note: Press Control/Command while hovering over the link to get the window, otherwise you won't see anything different.
